fields.description: As a cloudformation developer, I would like to run several "update stack" test cases against AWS to see what events occur (and their status) in the stack events output.  Most of these update stacks will be run against a stack with an AWS::EC2::Instance resource type, with varying fleids of all 3 Update types (No Interruption, Some Interruption, Requires Replacement).  It is the intention that this story not check error conditions, or rollback.
fields.summary: Determine AWS stack events on several update runs

comments.body:
Several tests in https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/ARCH/Cloudformation+Update+Stack were done to determine behavior in the successful update cases of cloudformation stack update.  (Tests 1-30 were used for this purpose).

To summarize:  Some preconditions required to run update stack include having an existing stack, in CREATE_COMPLETE, UPDATE_COMPLETE, or UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE state.  

In addition, there must be some change to one or more of the resources in order for update stack to be allowed.  (New or removed resources 'count', as do changes to metadata or properties fields within resources.)

The general workflow for update is as follows.
1) The stack changes status to UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS
2) New resources are created as in the create stack case.  Their resource status goes from CREATE_IN_PROGRESS to CREATE_COMPLETE.
3) Resources that need to be 'modified' (i.e. not replaced) have their status go from UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS to UPDATE_COMPLETE.
4) Resources that need to be 'replaced' have new resources created (with the same logical id) and their status goes from CREATE_IN_PROGRESS to CREATE_COMPLETE.
5) The stack changes status to UPDATE_COMPLETE_CLEANUP_IN_PROGRESS.
6) All resources from the original stack that are not in the updated stack, and all 'replaced' resources now are deleted.  Strangely the resource status of each of these items remains what it was (UPDATE_COMPLETE or CREATE_COMPLETE) until the resource is finally removed.  There are stack events that describe the DELETE_* statuses, however.
7) The stack changes status to UPDATE_COMPLETE.

More detail about failures can be found in the document linked in this comment.

*Steps*

# Use linked {{cfn-elb-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json}} template to create stack:
{code}
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-create-stack NginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json --parameter ImageId=emi-ee2e1cdf --parameter KeyName=testrunner-admin --parameter InstanceType=m1.small --region testrunner-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000651989085:stack/NginxStack/bfd78f5d-4223-41af-ba66-5bec5ab3d4e7

[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	NginxStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack in Eucalyptus VPC	2016-08-09T20:25:44.884Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-ee2e1cdf
PARAMETER	KeyName		testrunner-admin
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.small
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-VRM2VR3KKTHLM-000651989085.lb.d-30.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Use linked {{cfn-elb-cloudwatch-vpc-update-template.json}} template with {{UpdateStack}} call against deployed stack:
{code}
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-update-stack NginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-cloudwatch-vpc-update-template.json --parameter ImageId=emi-ee2e1cdf --parameter KeyName=testrunner-admin --parameter InstanceType=m1.medium --region testrunner-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000651989085:stack/NginxStack/bfd78f5d-4223-41af-ba66-5bec5ab3d4e7
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	NginxStack	UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated	CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack in Eucalyptus VPC	2016-08-09T20:25:44.884Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-ee2e1cdf
PARAMETER	KeyName		testrunner-admin
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-VRM2VR3KKTHLM-000651989085.lb.d-30.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Run {{CancelUpdateStack}} to initiate rollback:
{code}
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-cancel-update-stack NginxStack --region testrunner-admin@
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	NginxStack	UPDATE_ROLLBACK_IN_PROGRESS	Stack update was canceled by user.	CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack in Eucalyptus VPC	2016-08-09T20:25:44.884Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-ee2e1cdf
PARAMETER	KeyName		testrunner-admin
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.small
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-VRM2VR3KKTHLM-000651989085.lb.d-30.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com

....
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	NginxStack	UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack in Eucalyptus VPC	2016-08-09T20:25:44.884Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-ee2e1cdf
PARAMETER	KeyName		testrunner-admin
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.small
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-VRM2VR3KKTHLM-000651989085.lb.d-30.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Re-run {{UpdateStack}} call using linked {{cfn-elb-cloudwatch-vpc-update-template.json}} template with stack:
{code}
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-update-stack NginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-cloudwatch-vpc-update-template.json --parameter ImageId=emi-ee2e1cdf --parameter KeyName=testrunner-admin --parameter InstanceType=m1.medium --region testrunner-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000651989085:stack/NginxStack/bfd78f5d-4223-41af-ba66-5bec5ab3d4e7
[root@g-12-12 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region testrunner-admin@
STACK	NginxStack	UPDATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack in Eucalyptus VPC	2016-08-09T20:25:44.884Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-ee2e1cdf
PARAMETER	KeyName		testrunner-admin
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-VRM2VR3KKTHLM-000651989085.lb.d-30.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
